CHANGE_THEME_MESSAGE: Set the current aplication theme to light/dark.
CONNECT_TEXT: Connect with other attendees and event organizers, share experiences, exchange ideas, and build meaningful relationships within the Edventure community.
CREATE_EVENTS_TEXT: Do you have an event you want to organize? Make it happen with Edventure! Our platform allows you to create and customize events easily and efficiently.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_MODAL: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
DELETE_MODAL_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
EXPLORE_EVENTS_TEXT: Discover a wide range of exciting events to suit your interests. Edventure connects you with unique experiences you won't want to miss.
GENERAL_ERROR: An general error has occurred. Please try again later.
HOME_SUBTITLE: Edventure is a comprehensive platform designed to simplify event management and make the experience of attending events more enriching and exciting.
HOME_TITLE: Attend your events, or just create them yourself.
NAME: Name
NO_EVENTS_CREATED: There are no events created yet.
NO_FUTURE_EVENTS: You don't have any future event.
PUBLIC_EMAIL_MESSAGE: People will be able to contact you by your profile email.
QUESTION_DESCRIPTION: To finish, give a description of your event
QUESTION_NAME: What is the name of your event?
QUESTION_TYPE: What is the type of your event?
